00038 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 |   class references
00040 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00041 class AP4_ByteStream;
00042 class AP4_AtomInspector;

00044 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 |   AP4_Expandable
00046 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 class AP4_Expandable
00048 {
00049  public:
00050     // types
00051     enum ClassIdSize {
00052         CLASS_ID_SIZE_08,
00053         CLASS_ID_SIZE_16
00054     };
00055      
00056     // class methods
00057     static AP4_Size MinHeaderSize(AP4_Size payload_size);
00058 
00059     // methods
00060     AP4_Expandable(AP4_UI32    class_id, 
00061                    ClassIdSize class_id_size, 
00062                    AP4_Size    header_size, 
00063                    AP4_Size    payload_size);
00064     virtual ~AP4_Expandable() {}
00065     AP4_UI32           GetClassId()    { return m_ClassId;                  }
00066     AP4_Size           GetSize()       { return m_PayloadSize+m_HeaderSize; }
00067     AP4_Size           GetHeaderSize() { return m_HeaderSize;               }
00068     virtual AP4_Result Write(AP4_ByteStream& stream);
00069     virtual AP4_Result WriteFields(AP4_ByteStream& stream) = 0;
00070     virtual AP4_Result Inspect(AP4_AtomInspector& inspector);
00071 
00072  protected:
00073     // members
00074     AP4_UI32    m_ClassId;
00075     ClassIdSize m_ClassIdSize;
00076     AP4_Size    m_HeaderSize;
00077     AP4_Size    m_PayloadSize;
00078 };
00079
